channel.title: wordpress on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in wordpress on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Imported all entries from my Wordpress into Hakyll
item.description: ##22:41 Friday 07 November 2014 JST## Got all the text as far as I can tell, though the tags sometimes have capital letters. BUT the much bigger problem is that none of the images were imported. Their links are embedded in the entries, but the actual files are on robnugen.com/blog/wordpress/whatsit ##10:13am Saturday 8 November 2014 JST Okay, so last night I forked and tweaked mloskot/exitwp-hakyll so now I have my own hakyll version of exitwp
